content: Roll [[/r {1d4} #Wishes]]{1d4} to determine how many wishes the card grants you, which also affects the phase of the moon depicted on the card (1: crescent moon; 2: half moon; 3: gibbous moon; 4: full moon). These wishes each take one action to speak and have the effect of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Wish]{Wish} spell.
name: Moon
